5.3 DUIM-Sheets Module

clipboard-sheet

Generic function

Summary

Returns the sheet with the clipboard lock.

Signature

clipboard-sheet clipboard => sheet

Arguments

clipboard
An instance of <clipboard>.

Values

sheet
An instance of <sheet>.

Library

duim-sheets

Module

duim-sheets

Description

Returns the sheet with the clipboard lock.

See also

<clipboard>, page 235

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
